Text: Black Marlin affidavitTeb could you review the attached affidavit which is substantially similar to the other that you signed The only difference this time is the name of the plaintiffs If you could fill in the blanks for me as much as possible If not Ill get them filled tomorrow If youre OK with it Ill have Iris bring down an original for your signature and shell notarize it THANKS
Tebs AffidavitTeb I have revised the affidavit Please call Iris if you need someone to notarize this andor the verification for the discovery Thanks
RE Houston Ship Channelruling on summary jgment Cc Yes Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet
Re Station Docsnan

ECS Amendment Cc I left you a voice mail regarding the attached amendment to the ECS Agreement We would like to get this finalized as soon as possible Bascially the changes just clean up certain terms necessary as a result of the change of the engineering configuration You may recall we discussed some of the necessary changes with you and Mark in Rob Kilmers office a few weeks ago Also I have incorporated the June amendment into this document so we wont have to keep track of more than one amendment Because we changed Compressor Motor to Compressor Driver we need to make this change in the other two documents I am uncertain if I have the last version of these documents Could you forward them to me by Email Thanks Please call me or Teb if you have questions

Amendment to CSAunderstand that we are meeting tomorrow at in Robs office to discuss the proposed amendments to the ECS Agreement Attached for your review is a redlined copy of the Agreement with the amendments originally proposed in November I am also incorporating in this document the amendment we signed on Dec regarding Section so that all amendments to the Compression Services Agreement will be captured in one document
CSA Amendment Cc attached is the CSA with our revisions in redline If you have any questions please feel free to call me Thanks

Re Florida PSC Petition Cc it looks good We made some very really minor changes if youre interested See the attached Do you have any idea what kind of timetable we are looking at in terms of getting a decision Thanks Gerald CT AM To Staci NRON cc Chris ct Mark CT Subject Florida PSC Petition Staci Attached is the final draft of the petition we are jointly filing with Gulf Power Company The plan is to file it tomorrow in Tallahassee I will get with you shortly on finalizing the CSA amendments

Conference call Cc Assuming you can arrange it with your outside atty Rob and I a re available tomorrow morning around am Please let me know what yo u can work out We would like to act on this asap Thanks

EECC Agreement with ECS In response to your question regarding the status of the agreemen t to have Jim Alexander act as ECS representative David Bargainer is reviewing this agreement and he hopes to have something to you early next week Thanks

FW Change in conference call date and timejust realized that I had this on my calendar for the wrong time its Eastern thats our time in case any of you also had misinterpreted the message Original Message From Daphne E Gilbert ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESDaphneEEGilbertCdaphnekatzlawEcom E NRONcom Sent Monday April PM To Nemec Gerald Robinson Marchris Holtzman Staci Subject Change in conference call date and time The conference call originally scheduled for tomorrow at EST has been rescheduled for Wednesday at pm EST Provided below is the callin number and passcode Call in Passcode wwwkatzlawcom This transmission is intended to be delivered only to the named addressees and may contain information that is confidential proprietary attorney workproduct or attorneyclient privileged If this information is received by anyone other than the named addressees the recipient should immediately notify the sender by EMAIL and by telephone and obtain instructions as to the disposal of the transmitted material In no event shall this material be read used copied reproduced stored or retained by anyone other than the named addressees except with the express consent of the sender or the named addressees Thank you
Amendments to Compression Services Agreement Here is the revised CSA that you ask me to resend We are an xious to get this finalized Thanks

Amendment to Compression Services Agreement Cc your review is a redlined version and clean version of the amendment with our proposed changes I understand we will be meeting in Rob Kilmers office in at am this morning to discuss Thanks

Revised ECS Amendmentfor your review and comments is an amendment to the Compression Services Agreement which rather than extending the lockin deadline clarifies the parties original intent I understand we are meeting at am this morning in Rob Kilmers office EB to discuss
Changes discussedis the ECS Amendment with the changes I discussed with Gerald to c

ECS Amendmentand Gerald Attached is a draft of an amendment to the CSA that would guarantee the Charges as quoted until December as discussed I have attempted to leave in place as much of the previously agreedupon amendment as possible Please call me if you have questions On a separate note Regarding the recent change in equipment configuration because there is a definition of VFD in all agreements the best way to handle these changes may be a separate Letter Agreement that would replace the references to VFD in all agreements with the appropriate substitute if any

RE Form of AffidavitNonPrivilegedpst Ill give you a call this afternoon I will be in a meeting until around Thanks Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Monday July AM To Holtzman Staci Subject Form of Affidavit Staci Attached is a draft of an affidavit the ECS is proposing to supply West Florida Electric Coop regarding an informal requests for documents that ECS received from WFEC Please review and lets discuss asap File WFEC Affidavitdoc
CSANonPrivilegedpst Gerald where are we on getting the CSA as amended executed

Amended Compression Service Agreement Cc NonPrivilegedpst Chris we would very much like to get the Amended and Restated Compression Services Agreement executed as these changes were agreed to several months ago and the project is moving forward Could you let me know when we can expect to get this agreement returned Thanks
Tomorrows depositionNonPrivilegedpst Gerald I know youve told me this before but I didnt put it in my calendar What time and where is tomorrows telephone depo Thanks

RE Tomorrows depositionNonPrivilegedpst Thanks Ill be there Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Monday September AM To Holtzman Staci Subject RE Tomorrows deposition It will be in C beginning at am CT tommorrow Original Message From Holtzman Staci Sent Monday September AM To Nemec Gerald Subject Tomorrows deposition Gerald I know youve told me this before but I didnt put it in my calendar What time and where is tomorrows telephone depo Thanks

Amended Compression Services AgreementNonPrivilegedpst Gerald Where we are on getting the amended CSA executed When we spoke last you were going to forward executed copies to me for FGTs signature so I wanted to make sure they werent floating around in the interoffice mail or something Thanks Staci

ECS Amendment Cc I left you a voice mail regarding the attached amendment to the ECS Agreement We would like to get this finalized as soon as possible Bascially the changes just clean up certain terms necessary as a result of the change of the engineering configuration You may recall we discussed some of the necessary changes with you and Mark in Rob Kilmers office a few weeks ago Also I have incorporated the June amendment into this document so we wont have to keep track of more than one amendment Because we changed Compressor Motor to Compressor Driver we need to make this change in the other two documents I am uncertain if I have the last version of these documents Could you forward them to me by Email Thanks Please call me or Teb if you have questions

Amendment to Compression Services Agreement Cc your review is a redlined version and clean version of the amendment with our proposed changes I understand we will be meeting in Rob Kilmers office in at am this morning to discuss Thanks

RE Agaves portion of the Grynberg invoices Cc Yes please Bill give me a call when you have a chance Thanks Original Message From LaGesse Denise Sent Thursday November AM To Holtzman Staci Cc Rapp Bill Subject Agaves portion of the Grynberg invoices Staci Do you want Bill Rapp to approve Agaves portion of the Grynberg invoices since he has taken over Susans position If so please explain to him what these invoices are all about because I cant do it justice Thanks PS He has of these invoices in iPayit that he needs to approve so the sooner the better Thanks Denise LaGesse Enron Transportation Services Smith Street PO Box Houston Texas ph fax
